markdownRemark.html:
Complete guide to force setup LF End-of-line for all your Git projects working on Windows.

  1. Run
git config --global core.autocrlf false

from Git Console or when install Git:

  1. Run
git rm --cached -r .
git reset --hard

from Git Console from the root of your project

  1. Edit eol VS Code settings (User and Workspace):

  1. Create .gitattributes at the root folder:
# Set the default behavior, in case people don't have core.autocrlf set.
* text eol=lf

# Explicitly declare text files you want to always be normalized and converted
# to native line endings on checkout.
*.c text
*.h text

# Declare files that will always have CRLF line endings on checkout.
*.sln text eol=crlf

# Denote all files that are truly binary and should not be modified.
*.png binary
*.jpg binary
